author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body: It would have been preferrable to just retrigger with the original 0.1.0 version number.

@StefanKarpinski Tried that. I was having trouble retriggering the Registrator using the web version. The community advised me to use the GitHub bot instead. But the bot gave me this [error message](https://github.com/kraftpunk97/GymSpaces.jl/commit/d594b7b8bab9831ba959f40963a463e350494f49#commitcomment-34838534).
That's because you created a tag on your local repo pointing at the wrong commit. Just delete that, set the version back to 0.1.0 and try again.

body:
- Registering package: GymSpaces
- Repository: https://github.com/kraftpunk97/GymSpaces.jl
- Created by: @kraftpunk97
- Version: v0.1.1

- Reference: https://github.com/kraftpunk97/GymSpaces.jl/commit/24649adfaa942b03230a8a5a4e1d0789bba68132#commitcomment-34838628

title: New package: GymSpaces v0.1.1
